member.name: T:Fast.Serialization.ConverterFactory.EnumConverterFactory
member.summary: Enum 类型Json转换工厂

member.name: M:Fast.Serialization.ConverterFactory.EnumConverterFactory.CanConvert(System.Type)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the converter instance can convert the specified object type.
member.param: The type of the object to check whether it can be converted by this converter instance.
member.returns: if the instance can convert the specified object type; otherwise, .

member.name: M:Fast.Serialization.ConverterFactory.EnumConverterFactory.CreateConverter(System.Type,System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Creates a converter for a specified type.
member.param: The type handled by the converter.
member.returns: A converter for which is compatible with .

member.name: M:Fast.Serialization.Extensions.SerializationExtension.DeepCopy``1(``0)
member.summary: 深度拷贝
member.remarks: 此方法是通过将对象序列化成 JSON 字符串，再将 JSON 字符串反序列化成对象，所以性能不是很高，如果介意，请慎用

member.summary: 排序
